resources.string: The use of Arutairu requires a few adjustments to your keyboard. Since japanese doesn\'t use our alphabet, you will have to add the language in the settings. We recommend you to set up the input so you can enter kanas or kanjis by drawing them on your smartphone (handwriting mode). For some devices, you need to press the \"gear\" symbol at the top of your keyboard.
A long press on one of these buttons will take you back to the beginning or the end of the list.
Hey, welcome! Thank you for downloading Arutairu!
Please enter correct parameters in order to create the next lesson.
What would you like to learn?

We regret that you have this problem, but your device does not have the Japanese language for the text-to-speech engine. But don\'t worry, you can always try to install the TTS of your choice, or click on "download".
Hey, it\'s time to learn Japanese!
Would you like to set a daily reminder?

It\'s important to practise every day. In fact, it\'s absolutely crucial if you want to become comfortable with the language quickly! \n\nIf you wish, we can send you a notification to remind you to learn some vocabulary.

There are no specific instructions for the use of this tool. However, we suggest you to start by selecting a chapter and choose the practice mode. With this mode, you can ask the app to pick a limited number of words to make it easier and more efficient for you (for example 10 or 20 words).

Memorize the words that have been selected, then go to the test page by clicking 'next' when you get to the end of the list. Arutairu will mix those words, and you'll have to complete with the translation of the word that will be displayed to you. You can repeat the exercise when you haven't successfully answered to all the words. In fact, we recommend that you continue as long as you make mistakes!

Finally, if you feel comfortable, the app can record your performance and keep track of your score (Test mode). The difference is that you don't choose the words, the application does it for you on the whole list.

NOTE: Even if we allows you to do the tests with our alphabet (Romajis), it's better to try to configure a Japanese keyboard to evaluate yourself in hiragana and katakana (even kanji if you are confident). If you are a beginner, it is better to learn these characters first before learning real words.

We wish you good luck!
If the daily reminder was no longer displayed on your device, this new update may fix the problem. Simply set the reminder again on the app.

To listen to the pronunciation of the word on your screen, you can press this button (an internet connection may be required).\n\n Also, you can now do a long press, which will start an automatic playback of the selected vocabulary.
To enjoy of all the features of Arutairu, we check your \"text to speech\" engine.
You have the necessary files. We hope you will love our app!\n\nIf you still have some problems with the pronunciation help system, you can download the Japanese voices from the main menu.
An unexpected error has just occurred...

We regret that you have this problem, but your device have some real issues with Arutairu. 

You probably won't hear anything without "text to speech", but you can still learn without this feature. 

Maybe, you can retry by downloading the data manually on the selection screen.

You will access the settings of the text-to-speech engine.\n\nIn the next screen, please select the Japanese language, sometimes indicated as \'日本語\'. If this doesn\'t work, try manually by accessing your phone\'s settings.
We are very grateful for your support to Arutairu! From now on, you have the privilege of using our app without the ads.\n\nWe wish you a lot of success in your learning!
